description: Raspberries are aggregate fruits composed of many small drupelets around a central core. They have a delicate, sweet-tart flavor and are known for their distinctive hollow center when picked.

flavor_profile.notes: Delicate sweet-tart flavor with floral notes

storage_tips: Store unwashed in the refrigerator for 2-3 days. Handle gently as they are very delicate. For longer storage, freeze on a baking sheet, then transfer to freezer bags. Frozen raspberries are excellent for jams.
preparation: Wash very gently just before using. Remove any stems or leaves. For jams, can be used whole or lightly crushed. The delicate structure makes them ideal for smooth jams.
